title: Configure default hours and availability mode Snapshot

view.title: Configure default hours and availability mode
view.subtitle: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

blocks.title: Owner Configure Hours completed
blocks.message: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

resultPayload.note: Hours/lead-time baseline configured on biz metadata.

data.instruction: Customer two attempts booking overlapping demand for the same offer/resource window.
data.expectedResult: System either books correctly under capacity rules or rejects with deterministic conflict response.

data.instruction: Create or login the owner account through Better Auth endpoints, then verify session context can call authenticated API routes.
data.expectedResult: Owner session exists and authenticated routes return success for this user.

data.instruction: As biz member, list bookings and progress one booking through operational status updates.
data.expectedResult: Authorized role can update status while preserving auditability and lifecycle consistency.

data.instruction: Create customer account/session and verify customer can browse published offers.
data.expectedResult: Customer session established and offer discovery succeeds.
